general.gigTitle: develop responsive website in react js

sellerCard.oneLiner: 5 Years of Experience in ReactJS, NextJS, NodeJS, MongoDB
sellerCard.description:
I love to dig into customer problems and solve them with modern technology. I create, scale, and optimize business portfolios that matter. To accomplish this, I focus on delivering key outcomes, building amazing teams, and quickly adapting to new learnings.

I have enjoyed many business domains throughout my career including Medical, Grocery Delivery, E-Commerce, On-Demand Booking Services, and Educational apps.

I can successfully scale up software businesses from 1 user to 1 million. - I put the customer at the center of all that I do.

description.content:
About us :


Greeting! From last 3 years, Im working as an expert react js developer. As a professional react developer, I'll convert your ideas into reality with perfection. I've done countless successful react.js projects and has an exceptional number of repeated buyers.


Why me :


I have strong expertise in these :

  • React js
  • Redux
  • React Material UI
  • Bootstrap 5
  • Rest API Integration
  • Node js
  • Nextjs
  • Express JS
  • Mongodb
  • Build Restful api
  • Deployment on the Heroku server.


Im available for you 24/7. I recommend you to first message me, we will discuss the projects in detail then we go forward without any misunderstandings.


Work Process :


The project will be split into seven phases which are :


  • Information gathering
  • Structure
  • Design
  • Build, Coding
  • Testing, Review
  • Launch
  • Maintenance

There will also be a QA part after every process so we can keep moving forward to have the end result youll love!

slide.name: develop responsive website in react js

questionsAndAnswers.question: If I have a website as a sample. Can you develop a website exactly the same way?
questionsAndAnswers.answer: Yes, I will develop the website exactly like your sample website in such a way that you yourself cannot make a difference between them.

questionsAndAnswers.question: What I have to provide you before starting working on the project?
questionsAndAnswers.answer: You will have to provide me the full overview of your Business + website design if you have + Business Logo + Color Combinations that you want in website + Domain and Hosting information and that's all

questionsAndAnswers.question: What If I don't have Logo for my site?
questionsAndAnswers.answer: Don't worry at all. I am here for you. I will make a logo for your website but I will charge some extra amount for this.

questionsAndAnswers.question: How will I receive my website after project is complete?
questionsAndAnswers.answer: I will provide you the link to the website and then you will be able to check your website fully. I will also provide you the source code of your website in the form of a Github or Gitlab repo from where you can download or clone your code files.

questionsAndAnswers.question: What If I need some changes in my website after sometime?
questionsAndAnswers.answer: You can contact me at any time and I will be there for you at that moment. So, Don't worry about anything.

packageList.title: Basic
packageList.description: Simple react JS website with 2 to 3 pages with navigation

packageList.title: Standard
packageList.description: For small and medium web app like Login , Sign Up and CRUD Operations perform.

packageList.title: Premium
packageList.description: For Large Scale Applications Like build architecture using react redux and Integrate REST API's
